Html:
Hi,

how do I change the encoding for pdf fonts? My input data is UTF-8 encoded and the pdf output is ANSI encoded. I would love for the pdf output to be UTF-8 encoded, too.

Best regards, Jan

It would be nice, but unfortunately there is not much that can be done about this at the moment. The underlying package does not support Unicode:
http://www.codeplex.com/PHPExcel/WorkItem/View.aspx?WorkItemId=6742
